education_text.0: At first Brandenburg thought that the patent examiner was right, but as he studied the matter further he began to realize that the needed degree of compression might be possibleAt first Brandenburg thought that the patent examiner was right, but as he studied the matter further he began to realize that the needed degree of compression might be possibleAt first Brandenburg thought that the patent examiner was right, but as he studied the matter further he began to realize that the needed degree of compression might be possibleThe research results of his dissertation are the basis of  Layer 3 (mp3),  Advanced Audio Coding (AAC) and most other modern audio compression schemes
